features: 【6 Textures Sensory Fidget Toys】Our textured, extra durable, bright, stretchy, calming sensory toys provide a unique tactile experience with 6 different textures and tensions that satisfy your senses and provide a pleasant sense of calm，are soft and flexible ,Each sensory shape is designed with different color and shapes and different texture, meet all your kids sensory needs through squeezing，pulling and touching these textured shapes. Great christmas stocking stuffer toys for toddler.

【Colors and Shapes Learning】 These developmental montessori teaching tool have 6 shapes includes triangle, rectangle, square, circle, pentagon, and star shapes with 6 different color like Red,Blue,Green,Yellow,Orange and Purple colors. It helps children learn shapes and geometry, and builds color recognition.These squeeze anxiety relief toys are great for kids with anxiety, stress, Autism, ADHD, and ADD. The perfect addition to your calm down corner,combining fun and learning at the same time.

【Strengthened Safe&Durable Material】Each item measures 2.5 to 3.5" in size, weights about 1-1.5oz, and can be pulled or stretched to over 15 inches!These sensory learning toys are made of high quality soft sturdy materials and can withstand heavy-duty use from toddlers and not easy to get to pieces. All the edges are made into smooth and rounded shape for skin-friendly. With an ASTM F963 International Toy Standard Certificate, these classroom calm down corner toys are safe to play with.

【Upgraded Quality with Premium Materials】 If you are looking for stress anxiety relief and calming sensory learning toys for kid with anxiety, stress, Autism, ADHD, and ADD, this set of sensory fidgets or special needs toys is best for you,With unique textures on each squeeze sensory toy and designed using the latex-free TPR materials for extra durability, These super sensory toys will actively work to relieve stress and provide toddlers with hours of calming entertainment at home or at school.

【AMAZING GIFT IDEA FOR CHRISTMAS】: Zaxideel sensory toy set is a perfect gift for birthdays and Christmas stocking stuffers as well as an Christmas basket filler, party favor goody bags, pinata fillers for preshchool kids especially for Toddler ,Spread the joy & share these unique texture toys with loved ones; Make someone's day with these stress relief items.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ZAXIDEEL Upgraded Sensory Toys , Shape and Color Learning Toys for Kids

Is this sensory product sticky when received? No,It has a small layer of non-toxic powder to make it not sticky ,you can sprinkle a little baby powder to remove the stickiness after washing . Can it be used as a chew toy? We don't recommend , It can only withstand light bite . Are the 6 colors random or fixed? You will get the red, yellow, green, orange, blue, and purple , But it will randomly appearing on every shape . Is it easy to fall off pieces after use ? NO, we have used the upgraded rubber material to make it not get to pieces after 10000+ stretches. Is it fit for a 18 months baby ? Yes, it can fit for 1-6 year old kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids and adults!
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my 1 yr old students to have in their sensory corner, but may buy a second set for myself. They are small, but perfect size for smaller hands. Easy to clean, and so far have been quite durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and Satisfying to Play with
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this set for myself as I have an office job and need something to keep my hands busy while on long phone calls. I loved the look of this set, and the price was very reasonable. I like them all so much! They are super stretchy, have varying textures, and are quite soft too. I'm always switching from one to the other and really do play with them all day! My daughter constantly tries to steal them from me as she loves them too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son is rough so no matter how hard he stretched it it doesn’t rip

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product so far
reviews.reviewText: My toddler really enjoys playing with the different textured and stretchy toys. So far they've held together. The material is difficult to keep clean since it attracts hair, dirt, strings, etc. Also worried that the points on the spikes one will be able to be bitten off, but it has held up to toddler chewing so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for all ages
reviews.reviewText: I bought several boxes of these as gifts for the kiddos in my family for Christmas. The adults had just as much fun. Definitely will be getting more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are surprisingly pretty sturdy. My 9 yr old hasn't managed to chew thru them yet. Impressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for sensory issues.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for a little boy who has sensory issues. He was excited about these. Perfect for him!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Its was damaged when I received it. The blue gel and glitter was everywhere. It even ruined the box to another product.
